list.en: Good game! Best of luck to you all!
list.ja: ナイスゲーム！みんなこれからも頑張ってね！

list.en: Gee whiz! That was fun. Good playing!
list.ja: すごい楽しかったよ！ナイスゲーム！

list.en: It was an honor to play with you all. Thank you.
list.ja: 一緒にプレイできて光栄です！ありがとう

list.en: Well played. I salute you all.
list.ja: お見事！みんなさすがだね

list.en: Ah shucks... you guys are the best!
I'm wrestling with some insecurity issues in my life but thank you all for playing with me.
list.ja: はー、ちょっと嫌な事があったりもしたけど...みんなとプレイ出来て楽しかったよ

list.en: I could really use a hug right now.
list.ja: 誰かに抱きしめられたい気分...

list.en: I feel very, very small... please hold me...
list.ja: 誰か...抱きしめてくれないかな...

list.en: I'm trying to be a nicer person. It's hard, but I am trying, guys.
list.ja: うん、やっぱ楽しくプレイすることが何よりも大事だよね

list.en: It's past my bedtime. Please don't tell my mommy.
list.ja: もうおネンネの時間は過ぎてるけど...お母さんには内緒だよ

list.en: C'mon, Mom! One more game before you tuck me in. Oops mistell.
list.ja: いいでしょ、お母さん！あと5分だけやらせてよ！あ、間違えた

list.en: Mommy says people my age shouldn't suck their thumbs.
list.ja: お母さんには、人の嫌がることはやっちゃダメって教わったんだ

list.en: For glory and honor! Huzzah comrades!
list.ja: 仲間たちに栄光と名誉あれ！
